mapper.select: SELECT employee_no FROM employee WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} AND employee_active = 'Y' AND employee_pw = PASSWORD(#{employeePw})

SELECT e.employee_no employeeNo, e.branch_no branchNo, e.employee_id employeeId, e.employee_active employeeActive, e.employee_position employeePosition, ed.employee_name employeeName, ed.employee_phone employeePhone, ed.employee_email employeeEmail, ed.employee_gender employeeGender, ei.employee_img_no employeeImgNo, ei.employee_img_origin_name employeeImgOriginName, ei.employee_img_file_name employeeImgFileName, ei.employee_img_size employeeImgSize, ei.employee_img_type employeeImgType, b.branch_name branchName, b.branch_level branchLevel
FROM employee e LEFT JOIN employee_detail ed ON e.employee_no = ed.employee_no LEFT JOIN employee_img ei ON e.employee_no = ei.employee_no LEFT JOIN branch b ON e.branch_no = b.branch_no WHERE e.employee_no = #{loginEmployeeNo}
